originalText.text:
I've lived at The Smile fore 2 years.  While I could talk about the amenities, which one needs to opt in for, what really makes this building special is the responsiveness of the staff, the proactive maintenance of the facilities,  and the cleanliness of the building.  It feels safe and has good security.  There are opportunities created for tenants to get together so that you can get to know the community and make friends.

The staff are super kind and friendly. I recently had knee surgery and the amount of support and caring that both myself and my visiting family were offered was so generous.  Truly a great place to live.

originalText.text:
I am extremely dissatisfied with "The Smile" complex. While living here, I have encountered a serious issue of noise and vibrations stemming from the building's engineering systems, particularly heat pumps. This noise and vibration are constant, around the clock, without any breaks, and have been plaguing me for several months now.

This situation is highly disappointing, as my life within "The Smile" complex has been significantly disrupted. The noise is especially pronounced during nighttime, severely affecting my sleep and overall quality of life.

I have reached out to the management with numerous requests and complaints, but it appears that my concerns have gone unnoticed. Not only has none of the tenants' issues, including mine, been resolved, but the overall response from the administration to our concerns has been quite unsatisfactory.

This situation is highly unsatisfactory, and the question of the quality of service and issue resolution for tenants within "The Smile" complex leaves much to be desired.

I cannot recommend "The Smile" complex to anyone who values comfort and tranquility in their living environment.

originalText.text: I scheduled a tour for 11:45 am they did not have it documented, the receptionist tells me, the agents may have forgotten or may have been away and therefore didn’t confirm their appointments. She also said it would be at least a 30 minute wait bc the agent was on a zoom call. Why would tours be scheduled when the person is unavailable. It’s extremely wasteful/disrespectful to my time. But of course in NYC, businesses don’t have good standard practices. If this is how you all do business I’m certainly glad to not be leasing here

originalText.text: Lived here for about 2 year, had to move because of work relocation. This is for sure the best apartment in east Harlem, I enjoyed the interior environment and commute was pretty convenient too.

text.text: Lived here for about 2 year, had to move because of work relocation. This is for sure the best apartment in east Harlem, I enjoyed the interior environment and commute was pretty convenient too.

originalText.text: Amazing apartment with a friendly and responsive property management team. Whenever I had questions, Jeremiah, Amanda, or Super will be there for you. Front desk doorman are super nice. Very wonderful experience for living at the Smile.
